resources.string: Permission is not granted, you will not be able to use permission related feature of this app.
QR code does not contain serialized dataContainer.
Cannot read verification data from QR code, maybe you scanned the wrong code?
This container is already scanned. Scan another QR code.
Wrong container scanned, try another QR code.
Somehow decoding failed, despite all datas are here. Try again if you want.
Somehow object data is null. Try again if you want.
No PGP block or base64 encoded container found. Maybe wrong QR code?

Plain type QRs is more efficient in terms of size, but does not have advanced features such as automatically ordering QRs while decoding, etc. which can cause more problems compared to datacontainer QRs.
Datacontainer QRs can contain text or binary data, and support advanced features such as automatically ordering QRs while decoding, detecting foreign datacontainer\'s QR while decoding, etc.
